name: Everest (itch) (WilliamCarter)
description:
Everest.

In this puzzle platformer, use your grappling hook to maneuver your way through the level. The hook can be used on snow, but not rock. the UI cursor will change color to show this.

Controls:

A and D:  Move left or right.

Spacebar: Jump, or Wall Jump if sliding on a wall.

Cusror: Aim grappling hook.

Mouse Click: Fire grappling hook. 

*All assets including code art and music were made during the jam.*
